Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pSrcCube
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Cube data is being copied from

Parameters.Name: pFilter
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Filter on source cube in format Year¦ 2006 + 2007 & Scenario¦ Actual + Budget. Blank for whole cube

Parameters.Name: pFilterParallel
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Parallelization Filter: Month¦Q1+Q2+Q3+Q4 (Blank=run single threaded). Single dimension parallel slices. Will be added to filter single element at a time. Dimension must not be part of filter

Parameters.Name: pParallelThreads
Parameters.Prompt: Maximum number of threads to run when parallel processing is enabled ( if <2 will execute one thread, but parallel filter is still applied )

Parameters.Name: pTgtCube
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Name of cube to copy the values to

Parameters.Name: pMappingToNewDims
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED IF TARGET HAS DIMS NOT IN SOURCE: DimX¦InputElementForDimX & DimY¦InputElementForDimY (specify an N level element for each new dim)

Parameters.Name: pSuppressConsol
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Suppress Consolidations (Skip = 1) Only use 0 for strings

Parameters.Name: pSuppressConsolStrings
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Suppress Consolidated String Cells (Skip = 1)

Parameters.Name: pSuppressRules
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Suppress Rules (Skip = 1)

Parameters.Name: pSuppressZero
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Suppress Null Cells (Skip = 1)

Parameters.Name: pZeroTarget
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Zero out Target Element PRIOR to Copy? (Boolean 1=True) Clears combination of pFilter and pMappingToNewDims

Parameters.Name: pZeroSource
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Zero out Source Element AFTER Copy? (Boolean 1=True). If pFilter is blank the whole source cube is cleared!

Parameters.Name: pFactor
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Multiply source value by factor (1 keeps the value as is). To modify existing values make the target element the same as the source with pZeroTarget = 0

Parameters.Name: pDimDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL. Delimiter for start of Dimension/Element set

Parameters.Name: pEleStartDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimiter for start of element list

Parameters.Name: pEleDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimiter between elements

Parameters.Name: pTemp
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delete temporary view and Subset ( 0 = Retain View and Subsets 1 = Delete View and Subsets 2 = Delete View only )

Parameters.Name: pCubeLogging
Parameters.Prompt: Required: Cube Logging (0 = No transaction logging, 1 = Logging of transactions, 2 = Ignore Cube Logging - No Action Taken)

Parameters.Name: pSandbox
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: To use sandbox not base data enter the sandbox name (invalid name will result in process error)

Parameters.Name: pFile
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Copy via file export and import. Reduces locks (0 = no, 1= use file and delete it 2= use file and retain it)

Parameters.Name: pDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: For pFile > 0. AsciiOutput delimiter character (Default = ',' exactly 3 digits = ASCII code)

Parameters.Name: pQuote
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: For pFile > 0. AsciiOutput quote character (Default = '"' exactly 3 digits = ASCII code)

Parameters.Name: pDecimalSeparator
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: For pFile > 0. Decimal separator for conversion of NumberToStringEx and StringToNumberEx (default = '.' exactly 3 digits = ASCII code)

Parameters.Name: pThousandSeparator
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: For pFile > 0. Thousand separator for conversion of NumberToStringEx and StringToNumberEx (default = ',' exactly 3 digits = ASCII code)

Parameters.Name: pSubN
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Create N level subset for all dims not mentioned in pFilter

Parameters.Name: pThreadMode
Parameters.Prompt: DO NOT USE: Internal parameter only, please do not use
